title: Real Estate Wholesaling VA – Lead Generation + JV Profit Sharing Opportunity
salary: 400/month + bonus per closed deal (If you want to show PHP: Php 23,000/month + bonus per deal)
job_overview:
I’m building a real estate wholesaling team focused on closing deals in the U.S. (starting in New Jersey and expanding). I’m looking for a motivated, experienced virtual assistant who knows how to generate leads and wants to grow with a serious long-term team.

Your daily role will include:
 • Pulling motivated seller leads from Zillow FSBO, Craigslist, Propstream, etc.
 • Cold calling or texting sellers using a script
 • Asking qualifying questions (condition, timeline, asking price, reason for selling)
 • Logging and updating leads in a Google Sheet or CRM
 • Following up with leads consistently
 • Sending hot leads to our JV closers

???? This is not just a VA job — this is a partnership track.
 • If you help bring in deals that close, you will earn a percentage of the profit.
 • You’ll be a part of our core team and rewarded as we grow together.

Ideal candidates:
 • Have worked with U.S. wholesalers or real estate investors
 • Know tools like Mojo Dialer, CallTools, REI Reply, Propstream, or Batch Leads
 • Speak and write clear English
 • Are hungry to grow and consistent in communication

???? Base pay starts at [$400/month] part-time, with performance bonuses and JV profit splits for closed deals.

To apply:
 • Use subject: “Let’s Close Deals Together”
 • Include a short voice recording or message introducing yourself
 • List tools you’ve used + what markets you’ve worked in
 • Share 1–2 examples of results you’ve helped investors or wholesalers get
